items.title: Browse the Applet Store
items.description: Discover and install applets from the store. Browse featured apps and find tools that enhance your workflow.

items.title: Create Apps with Ryo's Chat
items.description: Use Ryo's chat to build custom applets. Simply describe what you want, and Ryo will help you create it.

items.title: Install Applets
items.description: Click on any applet in the store to install it. Installed applets appear in your applet menu.

items.title: Run Applets
items.description: Open installed applets from the menu. Each applet runs in its own window.

items.title: Manage Your Applets
items.description: View and manage all your installed applets. Remove ones you no longer need.

items.title: Share Your Creations
items.description: Share the applets you create with others. Publish them to the store for everyone to use.
